Title: Relates to permitting third party signatures on the statutory short form power of attorney
Summary: Relates to permitting third party signatures on the statutory short form power of attorney; authorizes a third party to sign the statutory short form power of attorney and the statutory gifts rider for the principal in the principal's presence and at the principal's direction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to permitting third party signatures on the statutory short form power of attorney
